Title: The Wilderness
Plot: Following the sudden death of her husband, Davina is forced to cope with life alone and a sister who blames her for everything. After six months of mourning the death of her husband, Davina decides it is time to re-launch her life and embarks on a journey to rediscover happiness ? via a host of vivid characters, all of whom have their own bridges to cross.
ParentalRatingReason: M Drug use, offensive language and nudity
